name: RecoilMan
description:
Do you have what it takes to complete the mission? 

Do you have the courage to face your fears? Do you have the skill to overcome your limitations?  

Are you… the recoil man?  

Controls:

 A -> Move Left

 D -> Move Right

 Space -> Jump

 Left Click -> Fire

 1: Weapon 1

 2: Weapon 2

 3: Weapon 3

UndividedSensation - Maximiliam Rosén:

Programmer,

Game Designer,

Sound,

Art

Markstrm - Markus Bergström:
